entry.title: Integer Arithmetic
entry.content: 1.1. PRINCIPLE: Definition of unsigned encodingFor vector 1.2. PRINCIPLE: Definition of two’s-complement encodingFor vector 1.3. PRINCIPLE: Conversion from two’s complement to unsigned For x such that TMIN<=x<=TMAX: 1.4. PRINCIPLE: Unsigned to two’s-complement conversion For u such that 0<=u<=UMAX: 2.1. PRINCILE: Unsigned addition For x and y such that 0 <=x,y<2^w: 2.2. PRINCIPLE: Unsigned negation For any number x such that 0<=x<2^w,its w-bit unsigned negation is given by the following: 2.3. PRINCIPLE: Two’s complement addition For integer values x and y in the range -2^(w-1)<=x,y<=2^(w-1)-1: 2.4 PRINCIPLE: Two’s-complement negation For x in the range TMIN<=x<=TMAX,its two’s-complement negation is given by the formula: [TOC]

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment [TOC]
